Aid (P2 Abju): R30' 3 targets gain +5 temporary HP for 8 hr [+Level gives +5 temporary HP]
Aura Of Life (P4 Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to necrotic damage and immunity to maximum HP reduction and raises those w/0 HP to 1 HP for conc up to 10 min
Aura Of Purity (P4 Abju): 30' radius gives nonhostile creatures resistance to poison damage, immunity to disease, and Adv on saves vs. conditions for conc up to 10 min
Aura Of Vitality (P3 Evoc): R30' Self may use a bonus action to restore 2d6 HP to target 1/rd for conc up to 1 min

Banishment (P4 Abju): R60' Banishes target to home or a demiplane (Charisma neg) for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Bless (P1 Ench): R30' 3 targets gain +1d4 on attacks and saving throws for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Blinding Smite (P3 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +3d8 HP radiant and blinds (Constitution ends) for conc up to 1 min
Branding Smite (P2 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP radiant and lights target for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Circle Of Power (P5 Abju): Allies in a 30' radius gain Adv on saves vs. magic, and saves yields no damage instead of half, for conc up to 10 min
Command (P1 Ench): R60' Target obeys self one-word command (Wisdom neg) for 1 rd [+Level affects +1 target]
Compelled Duel (P1 Ench): R30' Target stays w/in 30' of self (Wisdom neg) and suffers Disadv on attacks on others for conc up to 1 min; self attacking another or a successful attack on target by an ally ends
Create Food And Water (P3 Conj): R30' Creates 45 lb of food and 30 gallons of water
Crusader's Mantle (P3 Evoc): Ally attacks in 30' radius inflict +1d4 HP radiant for conc up to 1 min
Cure Wounds (P1 Evoc): Touched regains 1d8+3 HP [+Level restores +1d8 HP]
Daylight (P3 Evoc): R60' Target centers a 60' radius bright light for 1 hr
Death Ward (P4 Abju): Touched retains 1 HP when next reduced to 0 HP for 8 hrs
Destructive Wave (P5 Evoc): 30' radius inflicts 5d6 HP thunder, 5d6 HP choice of radiant or necrotic, and knocked prone (Constitution half HP only)
Detect Evil And Good (P1 Divi): R30' Self senses aberrations, celestials, elementals, feys, fiends, undead, consecration, and desecration for conc up to 10 min
Detect Magic (P1 Divi): R30' Self senses magic auras for conc up to 10 min [R]
Detect Poison And Disease (P1 Divi): R30' Self senses poison, poisonous creatures, and diseases for conc up to 10 min [R]
Dispel Evil And Good (P5 Abju): Celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead suffer Disadv on self attacks for conc up to 1 min and a successful spell attack returns them to their home plane (Charisma neg); self touch ends enchantment, fright, or possession by them
Dispel Magic (P3 Abju): R120' Ends the effects of a spell up to level 3; successful DC 10 + spell level ends a higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Divine Favor (P1 Evoc): Self weapons inflict +1d4 HP radiant for conc up to 1 min
Elemental Weapon (P3 Tran): Touched weapon gains +1 attack and +1d4 HP choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder for conc up to 1 hr [+Level gives +2/+3 attack and +2d4/+3d4 damage at level 5/7]
Ensnaring Strike (P1 [Oath Of The Ancients] Conj): Self next successful attack restrains foe and inflicts 1d6 HP/rd piercing (Strength ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP]
Find Steed (P2 Conj): R10' Self gains service from a summoned spirit in steed form
Geas (P5 Ench): R60' Target carries out self instructions (Wisdom neg) for 30 dy [+Level extends duration to 1 yr/permanent at level 7/9]
Heal (D6 Evoc): R60' Target regains 70 HP and recovers from blinded, deafened, and diseased [+Level restores +10 HP]
Heroism (P1 Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +3 temporary HP each rd for conc up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Lesser Restoration (P2 Abju): Touched recovers from blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Locate Creature (P4 Divi): Self learns location of specified creature or species w/in 1000' for conc up to 1 hr
Locate Object (P2 Divi): Self learns location of a specified object or type w/in 1000' for conc up to 10 min
Magic Circle (P3 Abju): R10' 10' radius prevents choice of entry or exit (Charisma allows magical transit), inflicts Disadv on attacks, and negates charm, fright, and possession by choice of celestials, fey, fiends, or undead for 1 hr [+Level extends duration +1 hr]
Magic Weapon (P2 Tran): Gives touched weapon a +1 magic bonus for conc up to 1 hr [+Level gives +2/+3 bonus at level 4/6]
Misty Step (P2 [Oath Of The Ancients] Conj): Teleports self 30'
Moonbeam (P2 [Oath Of The Ancients] Evoc): R120' 5' radius inflicts 2d10 HP radiant (Constitution half; shapechanger Disadv and reverts form on failure) and moves 60'/rd for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d10 HP]
Plant Growth (P3 [Oath Of The Ancients] Tran): R150' Causes plants to overgrow in a 100' radius or enriches a 1/2 mile radius for 1 yr
Protection From Energy (P3 [Oath Of The Ancients] Abju): Touched gains resistance to choice of acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage for conc up to 1 hr
Protection From Evil And Good (P1 Abju): Willing touched gains immunity to charm, fright, and possession from aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead; those creatures suffer Disadv on attacks on target
Protection From Poison (P2 Abju): Touched recovers from 1 poison and gains Adv on saves vs. poison and resistance to poison damage for 1 hr
Purify Food And Drink (P1 Tran): R10' Removes poison and disease from nonmagical food and drink in a 5' radius [R]
Raise Dead (P5 Necr): Restores life to and removes diseases and poisons from a willing touched 10-day-old corpse
Remove Curse (P3 Abju): Frees touched from all curses
Revivify (P3 Necr): Restores life and 1 HP to a touched 1-minute-old corpse
Searing Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +1d6 HP fire, plus 1d6 HP fire/rd (Constitution ends) for conc up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +1d6 HP initial]
Shield Of Faith (P1 Abju): R60' Target gains +2 AC for conc up to 10 min
Speak With Animals (P1 [Oath Of The Ancients] Divi): Self may talk with animals for 10 min [R]
Staggering Smite (P4 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack w/in conc up to 1 min inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, Disadv on attacks and ability checks for 1 rd, and no Reaction for 1 rd
Thunderous Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +2d6 HP thunder and 10' push (Strength HP only) for conc up to 1 min
Wrathful Smite (P1 Evoc): Next successful self weapon attack inflicts +1d6 HP psychic and frightens (Wisdom ends) for conc up to 1 min
Zone Of Truth (P2 Ench): R60' Creatures in a 15' radius cannot lie (Charisma neg) for 10 min
Magic Notes:
Divine Sense: R60' May discern location of celestials, fiends, and undead for 1 rd 4/long rest
Lay On Hands: May heal 50 HP/long rest; may use 5 HP worth to cure disease or poison
Nature's Wrath: R10' May use Channel Divinity to create spectral vines that restrain target (DC 15 Dexterity or Strength neg)
Turn The Faithless: R30' May use Channel Divinity to make fiends and fey flee (DC 15 Wisdom neg) for 1 min
